-- Step 1: Clear any existing test data (optional) DELETE FROM public.car_inventory WHERE vin LIKE 'TEST%'; -- Step 2: Temporarily disable RLS for easier upload ALTER TABLE public.car_inventory DISABLE ROW LEVEL SECURITY; -- Step 3: Paste the generated INSERT statements below this line -- (Click "Generate Car Inventory SQL" button above) -- Step 4: After upload, re-enable RLS ALTER TABLE public.car_inventory ENABLE ROW LEVEL SECURITY; -- Step 5: Check your upload SELECT COUNT(*) as total_vehicles, COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE status = 'Available') as available, COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE status = 'Sold') as sold FROM public.car_inventory;
